title: vertical-align
description: The `vertical-align` CSS property specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell content within a line box or table row.
content: The property that aligns inline-level elements or table cells vertically relative to their line box or containing element. Itâ€™s useful for adjusting the positioning of text or images within a line or cell, such as aligning text to the middle or top of a container.
